gen:link.msg:message: `AfterSchoolActivities` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `EducationalLagResourcesReceived` is equal to `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_SocialThemesAccountingUseEducationalLagResourcesEducation_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU6_EducationalLagResourcesReceived')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_SocialThemesAccountingUseEducationalLagResourcesEducation_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU6_EducationalLagResourcesReceived return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
